feed.title: cAdvisor Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for cAdvisor: v0.45.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix CI jobs on v0.45 by @bobbypage in https://github.com/google/cadvisor/pull/3331
  • [0.45] Request the pid of another container if current pid is not longer valid by @harche in https://github.com/google/cadvisor/pull/3321

Full Changelog: https://github.com/google/cadvisor/compare/v0.45.0...v0.45.1

entry.title: New release for cAdvisor: v0.47.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [0.47] Backport of PR 3301 to 0.47 by @harche in https://github.com/google/cadvisor/pull/3313
  • Fix CI jobs on v0.47 by @bobbypage in https://github.com/google/cadvisor/pull/3329

entry.title: New release for cAdvisor: v0.49.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Cherrpick #3485 to release-v0.49- Remove s390x support by @bobbypage in https://github.com/google/cadvisor/pull/3486
  • build docker - add --provenance=false flag by @bobbypage in https://github.com/google/cadvisor/pull/3488

Full Changelog: https://github.com/google/cadvisor/compare/v0.49.0...v0.49.1

Binaries: SHA256 (./cadvisor-v0.49.1-linux-arm) = 5f4128a60c277a5f5182b22ea93c786b1016465934d908c37a4f5ce9d1dfd2b1 SHA256 (./cadvisor-v0.49.1-linux-amd64) = 1d5cc701a3fcdf1e8ed1c86da5304b896a6997d9e6673139e78a6f87812495b0 SHA256 (./cadvisor-v0.49.1-linux-arm64) = c535f46d789599f25c7c680af193d4402da27a98d9828eb2ec916af6256e0c0c ```

entry.title: New release for cAdvisor: v0.49.2
entry.content:
What's Changed
